articles.title: DPRK Premier Inspects Industrial Establishments in Hamhung
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Inspects Industrial Establishments in Hamhung
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of major industrial establishments in Hamhung City.
					 He inspected the February 8 Vinalon Complex, Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, Ryongsong Machine Complex and the Hungnam Terminal Factory to learn in detail about production and material supply.
					
					 Consultations of officials concerned were held at those complexes and factory.
					
					 They called for glorifying the leadership exploits performed by the peerlessly great men for those units by increasing the output of fertilizer for the manuring year, custom-built equipment, various chemical products and by overfulfilling the first year national economic plan of the five-year strategy for the state economic development in every index with indigenous efforts, technology and resources.
					
					 They also discussed measures to meticulously organize the technical management of equipment, fully supply raw and other materials and increase the proportion of locally available raw and other materials in expanding the production capacity and overhauling equipment.
					
					 Earlier, the premier visited the Ryugyong Pickle Factory.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK FM Raps U.S. Moves to Block DPRK's Economic Cooperation with African Countries
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK FM Raps U.S. Moves to Block DPRK's Economic Cooperation with African Countries
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA on Sunday as regards the foolish moves of the U.S. to block economic exchange and cooperation between the DPRK and African countries:
					 An assistant secretary of the U.S. Department of State during the recent visits to some African countries talked rubbish that "the nuclear threat from north Korea is not far away" and "the period that a nuclear weapon may be used again has come after the lapse of 70 years because of north Korea." Moreover, he reportedly claimed that African countries should break off all their relations with the DPRK if they are to evade the "nuclear threat."
					
					 As known to the world, the U.S. is the world's first country that made a nuclear weapon, the only user of it and the very one hell-bent on committing high-handed and arbitrary practices through nuclear threat and blackmail.
					
					 Such a country, masking its criminal colors, has gone so impudent as to groundlessly assert that the DPRK is posing "nuclear threat" to far-off Africa.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear weapons are targeting not African countries but the U.S. persisting in its hostile policy toward the DPRK and serve as a treasured sword of justice to blow up the U.S., the den of all evils in the world.
					
					 It is no more than a clumsy trick that the U.S. seeks to tarnish the image of the DPRK and sow discord between the DPRK and African countries through all sorts of paradoxes and estrangement moves.
					
					 The traditions of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and African countries are long-standing and historical ones that were forged and have developed since the early period of the struggle for independence and the building of new society in those countries. They are being further consolidated through mutually beneficial cooperation based on independence, equality and mutual respect.
					
					 As for the DPRK's cooperation with Uganda, it started at the request of the Ugandan government long ago and has given substantial help to the country. As a relevant contract has expired, the personnel of the DPRK are now withdrawing themselves from the country according to an agreement between the two countries.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. is giving an impression that Uganda has ceased its cooperation with the DPRK under the pressure of the former. This is indeed ridiculous.
					
					 The U.S. act of openly instigating African countries to sever relations with the DPRK is bound to go belly-up under strong denunciation of the countries in the region as it is a blatant interference in the internal affairs of sovereign states standing for independence.
					
					 The government of the DPRK will as ever invariably boost its traditional friendly and cooperative relations with African countries in the idea of its foreign policy--independence, peace and friendship.

articles.title: NDC Spokesman Warns U.S. of Nuclear Counter-action
articles.content:
NDC Spokesman Warns U.S. of Nuclear Counter-action 
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- These days the situation of the Korean peninsula is being rapidly pushed to the danger of the outbreak of a nuclear war.
					 A formation of nuclear strategic bombers B-52H under the 8th Air Force of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces on Guam was busy with a nuclear bomb dropping drill under the pretext of the exercise for long-range flight and air-strike at strategic targets on June 17.
					
					 The U.S. introduced the nuclear-powered submarine Mississippi capable of mounting a nuclear attack on the rival side into Pusan Port of south Korea on June 13.
					
					 A spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK said in a statement on Sunday in this regard:
					
					 The recent long-range flight exercise was a preparation for rapidly flying into the air over the Korean peninsula and the exercise for air-strike at strategic targets was a mobile rehearsal for making a surprise strike at the nuclear facilities, etc. of the DPRK.
					
					 The introduction of the nuclear-powered nuclear submarine into south Korea from other waters is aimed at examining the actual possibility of hurling a nuclear force in case of the second Korean war.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are none other than the gangsters who do not hesitate to ignite nuclear and other wars to carry out their sinister ambition to shake the DPRK's will and resolute decision by wielding a nuclear stick.
					
					 This is the true colors of the present U.S. administration loud-mouthed about "a world without nuclear weapons" and an ulterior aim of forcing the DPRK "to dismantle its nukes first."
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the banner of simultaneously developing the two fronts held high by the service personnel and people of the DPRK is the best one to protect peace of the country and security of the nation from the disaster of a nuclear war.
					
					 Peace is dear to the DPRK.
					
					 But, it does not wish to achieve peace by begging and sympathy.
					
					 Our way of achieving peace is to mount a prompt and merciless preemptive attack of our style on any enemy no matter from where it is coming to disturb peace which is so dear to us.
					
					 The Korean People's Army has long put into the range of its precision strike the U.S. bases and logistic bases for invading the DPRK, including the Anderson Air Force Base on Guam where B-52Hs are deployed and naval bases for nuclear submarines.
					
					 The U.S. should stop running amuck to realize its anachronistic daydream.
					
					 The U.S. must know better about the capability of nuclear counter-attack of the DPRK, a nuclear power in the East.
					
					 Rash actions disregarding reality would only invite a serious disaster.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will dynamically advance to win a great victory, decisively foiling the "sanctions" of all hostile forces against the DPRK and their moves to stifle it and nuclear threats and blackmail against it.
					
					 The final victory is in store for the great Workers' Party of Korea and service personnel and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Reckless Military Actions of S. Korea and U.S. Denounced
articles.content:
Reckless Military Actions of S. Korea and U.S. Denounced
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Recently the south Korean military warmongers are massively introducing warships flying the cursed flags of the "UN forces" and the south Korean puppet regime into the mouth of the Han River beyond the hotspot waters of the West Sea under the pretext of "controlling" the illegal fishing by fishing boats of the third country. This is conducted under the codename of the so-called the "Han River operation."
					 The mouth of the Han River is the place where military forces of the north and south have never appeared since the armistice in 1953.
					
					 It is the area where all acts of both sides are correctly detected by naked eyes without any monitoring device.
					
					 The "operation" conducted by the south Korean puppet army in this area with heavily armed warships and helicopters involved is aimed at escalating the intrusion into the hotspot waters in the West Sea of Korea into the inland to secure a chance for military provocation.
					
					 This military operation is underway under carefully prearranged preparations.
					
					 Prior to the kick-off of the operation, the south Korean puppet military warmongers pushed the intelligence watch posture "Watchcon" to "1" from "3 A" and launched an intensive watch on the area of the DPRK side day and night with drones and all types of electronic surveillance devices involved. One hour before the start of the operation, they put the artillery units in all operational theatres combat ready after raising their firing posture to "A" from "C". 
					
					 They have already formed the so-called operation team with the marine corps and the naval special warfare force in mid-May and let a huge task group made up of combat warships and helicopters frequently intrude into the naval boundary line of the DPRK side in all southwestern hotspot waters including Yonphyong Island from June 10.
					
					 This clearly proves that the south Korean warmongers pin a great hope on this "Han River operation" in carrying out their scenario for escalating the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The provocateurs are so ridiculous as to publicly claim that accidental armed conflicts are more likely in this area than the northwestern islands as there is no fixed Military Demarcation Line at the mouth of the Han River and communication between ships is very limited there.
					
					 This balderdash clearly shows that the south Korean puppet military warmongers are launching the "Han River operation" on the premise of military clash with the Korean People's Army.
					
					  None of the preceding ruling quarters of south Korea ill-famed for inciting confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north has hurled warships into the mouth of the Han River to spark the danger of clash.
					
					 The reckless acts of the Park Geun Hye group are baffling human imagination.
					
					 The military provocations of the south Korean military warmongers escalating to the mouth of the Han River from the hotspot waters in the West Sea are designed to cause the Korean People's Army to take a self-defensive counter-action in these waters and build up the public opinion terming it "provocation and threat" from the north.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces are directly involved in the operation, not content with zealously patronizing it.
					
					 Prior to this operation, the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea appeared in Panmunjom and sent over loudspeaker "notice" in a sinister bid to explain its justice.
					
					 By appearing in the scene of the operation kicked off by the puppet forces under the veil of the Military Armistice Commission which nobody recognized, they self-exposed that they are the arch criminals escalating the military tension.
					
					 The U.S. artificially created the world's biggest hotspot waters by cooking up the "northern limit line", illegal and brigandish ghost line, persistently shunning the fixing of the fair extension of the MDL in the West Sea 60-odd years ago.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are the worst confrontation maniacs keen to ignite the second Korean war at the instigation of their U.S. master.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK value peace of the country and security of the nation more than anyone else.
					
					 That is why they can never allow such military provocations as reckless intrusion into waters and preemptive firing to disturb peace and security.
					
					 The Korean People's Army has already served warnings to all provocateurs intruding inviolable territories, seas and air over  which the sovereignty of the DPRK is exercised enough to make them understand how it will retaliate against them. .
					
					 The Korean People's Army is following with higher vigilance the ever-more dangerous military moves of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and the south Korean puppet warmongers.
					
					 The provocateurs would be well advised not to forget the bitter lesson taught by the Yonphyong Island shelling.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Pay Homage to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Pay Homage to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of Koreans in Japan headed by Choe Yun I visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Sunday.
					 The members of the group laid bouquets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Visit Revolutionary Museum of Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Visit Revolutionary Museum of Kim Il Sung University
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials visited the Revolutionary Museum of Kim Il Sung University Sunday, the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Among them were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and Choe Ryong Hae who are members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, members of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang City and officials of the C.C., WPK.
					
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statue of Kim Jong Il at the university and paid tribute to him.
					
					 They looked round various places of the museum which comprehensively deals with the historical materials the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu who glorified the university as a reliable center for training native cadres and the highest seat of the Juche-oriented education while leaving sacred footprints in the university during the whole period of their revolutionary leadership.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and portraits of the smiling great leaders on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Seen standing before the statues on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Placed before the statues were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, enterprises and schools in Pyongyang as well as bouquets and flowers.
					
					 They made bows to the statues of the great leaders.
					
					 Floral tribute was also paid to the statues and portraits of the smiling great leaders in different parts of Pyongyang including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security and the Mansudae Art Studio in the names of units of the KPA, organs and enterprises.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children in various parts of the country visited the statues and portraits of the smiling great leaders in their residential areas.

articles.title: National Circus Gives Performance
articles.content:
National Circus Gives Performance
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The National Circus gave a performance Sunday, the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Among the audience were senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam and Choe Ryong Hae who are members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries, national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials, merited persons and other people of organs, factories and enterprises in Pyongyang.
					
					 Colorful programs were put on the stage to give an excellent ideological and artistic depiction of revolutionary enthusiasm and optimism of the service personnel and people of the DPRK and the development of the Juche-based acrobatic art with smart stunts and rhythm.

articles.title: Art Squad of C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Gives Performance
articles.content:
Art Squad of C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Gives Performance
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at the plaza of the Monument to Party Founding on Sunday, the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as chorus "Glory to Workers' Party of Korea".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the feats Kim Jong Il performed by developing the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and powerful guiding force to accomplish the cause of the Juche revolution and demonstrating the dignity and might of the country and the nation before the world with his brilliant idea and theory and outstanding leadership.
					
					 Such numbers as male duet "Young People, Be Loyal to Our Party" reflected the firm determination of the young vanguard to uphold with loyalty the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who puts forward the policy of attaching importance to youth as an eternal strategic line of the party and always pays deep concern to the affairs with the young people.
					
					 Among the audience were officials of the youth league and youth and students here.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in Pyongyang and other parts of the country on Sunday, the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Dancing parties started with the playing of the song "Fortune of Korea" at the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, the Arch of Triumph and other places in Pyongyang.
					
					 The dancers enthusiastically danced in boundless reverence for Kim Jong Il who developed the WPK into the Juche-oriented revolutionary party and the party of the leader with his unique party-building idea and theory and outstanding leadership and thus opened a new era of the prospering nation.
					
					 Such songs as "Young People, Be Loyal to Our Party" and "Victory Will Be Won Generation after Generation" resounded forth at the dancing places, revving up the festive atmosphere.
					
					 Dancing parties of youth and students were also held in provincial seats on the same day.

articles.title: Holiday in June Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Holiday in June Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The service personnel and people of the DPRK significantly celebrated the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on Sunday.
					 Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and portraits of the smiling great leaders on Mansu Hill and in other parts of the country.
					
					 Performances were given by national art troupes at theatres in Pyongyang.
					
					 The concert "Fly High, Our Party Flag" was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre, the revolutionary opera "Victory of the Revolution Is in Sight" at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre, the newly produced dance suite "Our Golden Country" by the National Folk Art Troupe at the Ponghwa Art Theatre and the drama "Blood Vessel" at the National Theatre.
					
					 Diverse jugglery pieces were staged by the National Circus to the delight of spectators.
					
					 Hymns praising the great men and the WPK resounded forth at theatres in local areas.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
 Chongjin, June 19 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen held a meeting at Chongjin Port on Sunday, the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Earlier, the participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting of the captain and crewmen of the Cambodia-flagged ship Everbright.
					
					 The speakers said that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the organizer and guiding force of all victories of the Korean people by carrying forward the idea and cause of the President.
					
					 Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into an invincible political and military power, bravely meeting all challenges of the imperialist allied forces and resolutely smashing their moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK with his original Songun revolutionary leadership, the speakers noted, adding:
					
					 World-startling miracles are being registered in the DPRK every day under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK is the greatest happiness and honor of all the Korean people, the speakers expressed belief that only victory and glory will be in store for the Korean people.
					
					  A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: WPK, Party Based on Unity of Ideology and Will
articles.content:
WPK, Party Based on Unity of Ideology and Will
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- It has been 52 years after leader Kim Jong Il started his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on June 19, Juche 53 (1964).
					 On the anniversary, the DPRK people recall the feats he performed in strengthening the WPK into a dignified and powerful party of the leader.
					
					 The history of his guidance over the party is woven with the struggle to thoroughly establish the party's monolithic ideological and leadership system based on the Juche revolutionary outlook on the leader.
					
					 In his early years, Kim Jong Il clarified in a scientific way the position and role of the leader in the revolutionary struggle and formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism.
					
					 Under his wise guidance, the WPK was modeled on the idea of its leader and strengthened into an invincible vanguard acting as one under the monolithic guidance of the leader. Consequently, all its members got armed with Kimilsungism and the entire party achieved unbreakable unity on the basis of loyalty to the leader.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un said, in his report at the 7th WPK Congress, it is a valuable fruition of Kim Jong Il's unique idea and theory on party building and his distinguished leadership that the WPK has developed into a revolutionary party of Juche type, the party of the leader, and achieved remarkable successes in carrying out the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 In the new century of Juche, the WPK formulated the revolutionary ideas of the great leaders as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism while further enriching it as the eternal guiding ideology in the era of independence.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has wisely led the work to imbue the party and revolutionary ranks with one ideology, adhering to this as the seed and core of the struggle for establishing the party's monolithic leadership system.
					
					 That's why all the members of the WPK now share thought with the Party Central Committee, breathe the same breath as it and keep pace with it under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Thanks to the strict establishment of the monolithic leadership system, all the members of the WPK from its Central Committee to a party cell are replete with the revolutionary discipline and militant trait of devotedly implementing its decisions and orders.

articles.title: New Achievements Made in Building Ryomyong Street
articles.content:
New Achievements Made in Building Ryomyong Street
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The construction of Ryomyong Street is in rapid progress in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 In this week alone, builders finished the frame-working of 7, 10, 20 and 30-storied apartments one after another.
					
					 As of June 19, the carcass work of over 2,800 flats has been completed.
					
					 Thanks to the application of advanced methods of construction, it takes only 17 hours to complete the frame-working of one floor in building a skyscraper.

articles.title: Fish Farms Appear in Northern Uplands of DPRK
articles.content:
Fish Farms Appear in Northern Uplands of DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Jagang Province, a mountainous region in the DPRK, concentrates efforts on the construction of fish breeding grounds of various styles to improve its inhabitants' diet.
					 15 movable framed net fish-breeding grounds and greenhouse-style catfish grounds have taken their shapes in its cities and counties up to now.
					
					Kanggye City set up a movable framed net fish-breeding ground of 1,500 square meters in the River Jangja and built a greenhouse-style catfish farm.
					
					 Huichon City and Chosan, Tongsin, Rangnim and Usi counties set up various movable framed net fish-breeding grounds in rivers and lakes and put fish farming on a sci-tech basis.
					
					 Spawning stations of cities and counties supplied tens of millions of fries to those grounds.

articles.title: DPRK's Newspapers Editorially Observe Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK
articles.content:
DPRK's Newspapers Editorially Observe Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's leading newspapers carry editorials on Sunday, the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They say it was a historic event of tremendous significance in developing the WPK and accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution that Kim Jong Il started work at the Central Committee of the WPK on June 19, Juche 53 (1964).
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says that for the WPK and the Korean people June 19 is a revolutionary holiday along with October 10 as it is associated with the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed for building the party.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il was a peerlessly elder statesman with superb quality and personality as the leader of the party and revolution as he wisely led the cause of building the Juche-oriented party as required by the times and the developing revolution. 
					
					 He proclaimed it as the supreme programme of the party to model the whole society on Kimilsungism and advanced the policy of modeling the whole party on Kimilsungism after formulating the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism. This occupies a distinguished page in the history of the WPK. 
					
					 He organically combined politics with military affairs and established a firm leadership of the party over the revolutionary armed forces and provided a powerful military guarantee for the victorious advance of the revolution and construction for the first time in history. His Songun leadership exploits are clearly recorded in the history of the WPK.
					
					 His Songun politics and benevolent politics are shedding rays as the revolutionary leadership mode of the WPK and main political mode under socialism.
					
					 Minju Joson calls for holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal leader of the WPK and the Korean people and working hard to build a dignified socialist power under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Holding Higher Banner of National Independence
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Holding Higher Banner of National Independence
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Holding high the banner of national independence is essential for conducting the movement for national reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Sunday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Independence is a key to settling the national issues and serves as the lifeline in the movement for national reunification.
					
					 It is the issue of national reunification that the Korean nation should settle with its wisdom no matter how difficult and complicated it may be. The Koreans should achieve independent reunification by their concerted efforts only no matter what vicious outrages and challenges outside forces may perpetrate. 
					
					 The Korean nation has potentials enough to accomplish the cause of national reunification by its driving force.
					
					 The DPRK has a strong will to thoroughly contain and smash foreign forces' domination and interference by dint of the highest dignity of the great power and make a new history of national reunification and prosperity.
					
					 There is neither problem insolvable nor obstacle insurmountable if the Koreans join hands and pool their wisdom and efforts.
					
					 It is impossible to advance the cause of national reunification in line with the independent requirements of the nation and its interests without rejecting sycophancy and dependence on the outsiders.
					
					 It is necessary to solve the issue of national reunification independently through negotiations with compatriots, believing in their strength.
					
					 The article calls on all the Koreans in the north, the south and overseas to conduct a dynamic struggle against the anti-reunification acts of foreign forces and sycophantic and treacherous forces, holding high the banner of national independence in response to the appeal made at the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Refutes S. Korean Regime's Loud-mouthed "Cyber Terrorism from North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Refutes S. Korean Regime's Loud-mouthed "Cyber Terrorism from North"
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet police recently cried out for "taking strong countermeasure and strengthening security against cyber terrorism from the north," floating sheer lie that the north stole information related to munitions industry from south Korean civilian business.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a commentary this is another provocative farce to bring charge of "cyber terrorism" to the DPRK and maximize the racket for escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north under that pretext.
					
					 Whenever hacking cases happened, the puppet forces groundlessly insisted they were done by "the north" but all of them turned out to be farces orchestrated by those hell-bent on the confrontation with the compatriots in the north only to become a laughing stock of the public, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 By abusing the inhabitants' uneasiness about terrorism, the puppet regime pursues an ulterior aim of hurting the north and stoking bad blood towards compatriots in the north in a bid to justify and escalate its anti-north confrontation rackets going against the trend of the times and chill the desire of the public at home and abroad for improved inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It is quite natural that the whole south Korean society has turned into a theater of cyber terrorism and hacking cases occur one after another across south Korea as the ruling forces are unhesitatingly perpetrating hideous cyber terrorism for the sake of the regime's security and power.
					
					 Lurking behind the fiction of "cyber terrorism from the north" floated by the south Korean authorities is a cynical ploy of tricksters to cover up the despicable true colors of south Korea as the world's cesspool of cyber terrorism, divert the public criticism of them to the north and thus realize their wild ambition.
					
					 No one would be taken in by this false propaganda.

articles.title: Light Plane Crashes in S. Korea
articles.content:
Light Plane Crashes in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A light plane crash in South Jolla Province of south Korea left its pilot and two others dead on Friday, according to CBS of south Korea.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked by Japanese Regional Committee
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked by Japanese Regional Committee
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Japanese Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a meeting in Tokyo on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Present there were Son Hyong Gun, chairman of the Japanese Regional Committee, Sin Phil Yong, chairman of the U.S. Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, Han Chung Mok, co-representative of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, So Chung On, director of the department for international and reunification affairs of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Song Se Il, vice-chairman of the Democratic United Confederation of Koreans in Japan, members of the Japanese Regional Committee, officials of Chongryon and its organizations and enterprises and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The speakers referred to the fact that the June 15 event common to the nation failed to take place owing to the moves of the Park Geun Hye regime, expressing surging indignation at the south Korean authorities who totally denied the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 Owing to the wrong "policy toward the north" pursued by the Park regime, the Koreans are standing at the crossroads of life and death. If the south Korean authorities have even an iota of national conscience, they should opt for dialogue to defuse the military tension and allow the non-governmental north-south exchange including the above-said event.
					
					 The speakers declared that they would lift their voices calling for upholding and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and intensify the struggle against the U.S. and other anti-reunification forces.
					
					 An appeal of All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration was read out at the meeting.
					
					 Then, a seminar to mark the 16th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration was held.

articles.title: Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Introduced by German Body
articles.content:
Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Introduced by German Body
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The full texts of President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Three Principles of National Reunification" and leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Struggle Resolutely to Implement the Three Principles of National Reunification" were posted by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on its website on June 14 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The first work, published on May 3 and Nov. 3, Juche 61 (1972), clarifies the three principles of Korea's reunification--independence, great national unity and peaceful reunification. It also deals with the idea of realizing collaboration between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 The second work, published on July 14, Juche 61 (1972), deals with the necessity to struggle resolutely to implement the three principles of national reunification and indicates the tasks to do so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Personages
Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting, photo exhibition and film show in Myanmar and a lecture and film show in DR Congo on June 11 and 13 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venue of the photo exhibition were photos documenting exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos showing the Korean people making achievements in building a socialist power.
					
					 Tha Win, member of the Central Committee and secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, said it was Kim Jong Il's distinguished exploit that he developed the WPK into the organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people and led the Korean revolution to one victory after another, turning the DPRK into a politico-ideological power and a military power and laying a solid groundwork for reunifying the country.
					
					 Andre Lohekele Kalonda, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo, and Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, said in their speeches that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the one of President Kim Il Sung, a popular one which formed a harmonious whole with the masses and a political force successfully steering the cause of the Songun revolution.
					
					 Korean films such as "Flag of Workers' Party of Korea" were shown at the film shows.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in DR Congo.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Celebrated in India, Germany, Bulgaria
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Celebrated in India, Germany, Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Seminars and Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions took place in India, Germany and Bulgaria between June 13 and 17 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were their works, and books and photos introducing the DPRK and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il said it is the one of the greatest feats performed by Kim Jong Il while working at the Central Committee of the WPK that he built the WPK into the ideologically transparent integral whole and the party which realized firm unity and cohesion.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany praised Kim Jong Il for formulating the Juche idea into Kimilsungism, adding that he proclaimed the Juche idea as the only guiding idea of the WPK and strengthened it into the party of Kim Il Sung both in name and reality.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report on Review of Work of C.C., WPK Studied in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report on Review of Work of C.C., WPK Studied in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A reading session on the report made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to review the work of the Central Committee of the WPK was sponsored by the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy on June 9.
					 Present there were personages of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy and University of Abuja and masses.
					
					 The part dealing with the independent reunification of Korea in Kim Jong Un's report was read out by the chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said:
					
					 In his report the respected HE Kim Jong Un underlined the need for the Korean people to consistently maintain the three charters for national reunification which reflect the will and demand of all Koreans and whose vitality has been proved in practice, and to pave the way to reunification.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to realize the cause of reunification under the unfurled banner of national independence.
					
					 Then, the Korean film "Flag of Workers' Party of Korea" was shown.

articles.title: DPRK's Anniversaries Marked in Nigeria, Sweden
articles.content:
DPRK's Anniversaries Marked in Nigeria, Sweden
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Diverse events took place in foreign countries on the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 16th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. 
					 They were a seminar on of his work and an opening ceremony of the week of a photo exhibition in Nigeria and a seminar, photo and book exhibition and film show in Sweden on June 12 and 13.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were their works and books on their greatness and photos and books introducing the struggle of the DPRK's servicepersons and people for building a socialist power.
					
					 Korean film "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un" was shown at the film show.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism explained the main contents of Kim Jong Il's work "Our Socialism Centred on the Masses Shall Not Perish" and said as follows:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il built the WPK into a genuine mother party which takes care of the destiny of the people in a responsible manner.
					
					 He led the WPK and the Korean people to shatter the foreign forces' war moves and pave a broad avenue to national reunification.
					
					 A vice department director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the great men who built the WPK into an invincible and people's party.
					
					 The chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration is a precious fruition of the noble patriotic idea of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Sweden.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Indian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Indian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Indian newspaper Public News on June 11 dedicated an article to the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Praising Kim Jong Il as a great master of independent politics to be specially recorded in the history of world politics, the article said:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il's political philosophy is the Juche idea being recognized by the international community as a great guiding idea of the cause of human independence.
					
					 At the end of the last century when socialist countries collapsed one after another in East Europe, the DPRK remained unfazed, thanks to his transparent independent line.
					
					 His Songun politics is the most important one in his exploits.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics pursued by him, the military muscle of the DPRK was remarkably bolstered up and the sovereignty and socialism of the DPRK were creditably defended.
					
					 He also paid deep attention to building an independent new world after putting forward it as the main idea of his external activities to preserve independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 He conducted energetic foreign activities to strengthen the anti-imperialist independent forces.
					
					 He maintained his independent stand in carrying out the cause of national reunification and wisely steered the efforts to accomplish the reunification by the Korean nation itself. Thanks to him, the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration were provided to open up a bright future for Korea's reunification.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed by Foreigners
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Ugandan and Beninese figures released statements on June 13 to mark the 16th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Daniel Rugarama, chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement, said:
					
					 The great HE Kim Jong Il saw to it that a historic north-south summit was provided in June, 2000 and the June 15 joint declaration whose core is By Korean Nation Itself was adopted to be a landmark for Korea's reunification.
					
					 We send full support to the Korean people's just cause to achieve the national reunification by the concerted efforts of the nation.
					
					 For the reunification of Korea no acts against the June 15 joint declaration should be allowed.
					
					 A new line and policies for national reunification clarified by HE Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), at the Seventh Congress of the WPK are, indeed, the most just and realistic.
					
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" who doubles as chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said:
					
					 A shortcut to putting an end to the inter-Korean confrontation and achieving national reunification at an early date is to implement the June 15 joint declaration whose validity and vitality are clearly proven in practice.
					
					 Kim Jong Un advanced a new line and policies for national reunification at the WPK Seventh Congress to tide over the difficulties and comprehensively indicated the ways to do so.
					
					 His line and policies are an encyclopedic great programme for national reunification which gives perfect answers to all the issues arising in fundamentally improving the inter-Korean relations and opening a broad avenue to national reunification.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should respect and thoroughly implement the inter-Korean joint declarations.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Malaysia and a film show and photo exhibition in Bangladesh on June 12 and 13 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The participants watched the Korean film "Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification".
					
					 The secretary general of the Malaysia-DPRK Friendship Association hoped Korea's reunification would be achieved as early as possible under the policies for national reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee and other figures praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for performing immortal exploits in the cause of national reunification.
					
					 They praised Kim Jong Un for wisely leading the struggle of the Korean nation for accomplishing the independent reunification of the country true to the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Peruvian Body Demands U.S. Stop Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Peruvian Body Demands U.S. Stop Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement on June 14 demanding the U.S. stop its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. has long committed all hostile acts including the war of aggression against the Korean people.
					
					 Under the wise guidance of the great leaders Comrade Kim Il Sung, Comrade Kim Jong Il and the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, the Korean people have firmly defended their social system and cause while resolutely shattering the U.S. moves for aggression.
					
					 For the reunification of Korea the U.S. should immediately withdraw its aggression forces from south Korea and stop pursuing its hostile policy toward the DPRK at once as it is denounced and rejected by the world progressives.
					
					 We call upon all the peace-loving organizations of the world to protest against the U.S. ceaseless moves for a war of aggression against the Korean people.

articles.title: Russian Body Supports Inter-Korean Declarations
articles.content:
Russian Body Supports Inter-Korean Declarations
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The June 15 North-South Joint Declaration serves as a great programme for reunification as it displayed to the whole world the will to reunify Korea independently and peacefully by dint of the great national unity.
					 The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK said this in a statement on June 14.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 At the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un expressed his determination to pave the way for reunification by consistently holding fast to the three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation which are the three charters for national reunification by carrying out the lifetime intention and behests of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il.
					
					 But the south Korean authorities headed by Park Geun Hye, daughter of the worst dictator Park Chung-Hee, are working hard to shift the blame for tense situation on the Korean peninsula onto the DPRK while talking about its "nuclear threat", pursuant to the U.S. policy.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is making desperate efforts to realize the ambition for "unification by absorption" by following the policy of traitor Lee Myung Bak who destroyed the foundation of peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should abandon their sycophancy toward the U.S. and implement the three charters for national reunification, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration to achieve the reunification of Korea with the efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 If they insist on "unification by absorption", we will fully support the determination of the DPRK to reunify Korea by a non-peaceful way.
					
					 We are convinced that the day will surely come when Korea would demonstrate its dignity and might as a reunified power.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed by Ecuadorian Organizations
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed by Ecuadorian Organizations
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification and the Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People issued a joint statement on June 13 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The main idea of the joint declaration is the idea of By the Korean Nation Itself which calls for rejecting outside forces and achieving the country's reunification by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 The joint declaration reflects the firm idea of the Korean people that if the whole nation carries on the struggle by the concerted efforts, the country will be reunified. 
					
					 But the south Korean anti-reunification forces are blocking the implementation of the joint declaration.
					
					 The Korean peninsula is becoming the biggest hotspot in the world and hotbed of war owing to the war moves sought by the south Korean authorities who are resorting to the military confrontation with the compatriots in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 History proved that the thorough implementation of the joint declaration agreed between the north and the south is the only way of preventing a war and realizing the peace on the Korean peninsula and the independent reunification of the Korean nation.
					
					 The progressives of the world express firm solidarity with the Korean people who are struggling to implement the June 15 joint declaration and achieve the independent reunification of the country free from the interference of internal affairs by outside forces.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Introduced by Socialist Party of Romania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Introduced by Socialist Party of Romania
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il was posted by the Socialist Party of Romania on its website on June 15 to mark the 52nd anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia EE.UU. que trata de impedir relaciones economicas entre RPDC y paises africanos
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia EE.UU. que trata de impedir relaciones economicas entre RPDC y paises africanos
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de la ACNC formulada en relacion con que Estados Unidos maniobra absurdamente para impedir el intercambio y cooperacion economicos entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y los paises africanos, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 19 la siguiente respuesta:
					Hace poco, el asistente del secretario del Departamento de Estado norteamericano viajo a unos paises africanos, ocasion en la cual pronuncio las sofisterias de que "No esta de lejos la amenaza nuclear del Norte de Corea", "Debido al Norte de Corea llego al cabo de 70 anos la epoca capaz de usarse las  armas nucleares" y disparateo que los paises africanos deben romper todas las relaciones con la RPDC para evitar la "amenaza nuclear".
					
					Como esta conocido por el mundo entero, EE.UU. es el primer pais fabricador de armas nucleares y el unico que las uso en el mundo, asi como es el autor principal que recurre habitualmente a despotismo y arbitrariedad apoyandose en la amenaza y chantaje nucleares.
					
					Precisamente este criminal nuclear habla absurdamente de "amenaza nuclear" de la RPDC contra los paises africanos.
					
					Las armas nucleares de la RPDC toman como su blanco no los paises africanos, sino EE.UU. enloquecido en la politica hostil a Corea y sirven de un remedio de justicia para eliminar de raiz EE.UU., nido de todos males.
					
					No pasa de ser una artimana tonta la intencion de EE.UU. de manchar la imagen de la RPDC mediante una intriga de desunion y sembrar una discordia entre esta y los paises africanos.
					
					La larga e historica tradicion de amistad y la cooperacion entre la RPDC y los paises africanos fue preparada y desarrollada desde los principios de la lucha por la independencia y la construccion de nueva sociedad de ellos y se consolidan mas a traves de las cooperaciones de beneficio mutuo basadas en la independencia, la igualdad y el respeto mutuo.
					
					Las cooperaciones con Uganda fueron iniciadas desde hace mucho tiempo por la peticion del gobierno ugandes y ofrecieron la asistencia real. Ahora, los coreanos estan retirandose voluntariamente de este pais segun el acuerdo de ambas partes al vencer el contrato correspondiente.
					
					En tal situacion, EE.UU. habla como si Uganda dejo de cooperar con nosotros por la presion de los yanquis, lo que no pasa de ser una farsa.
					
					Tales actos del pais norteamericano que instiga abiertamente a los paises africanos a romper las relaciones con la RPDC deviene la flagrante intervencion en los asuntos internos de los Estados soberanos independientes y no podra evitar el fracaso por la condena y repudio fuertes de los paises regionales.
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC amplificara y desarrollara invariablemente las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con los paises africanos segun el ideal de la politica exterior basada en los principios de la independencia, la paz y la amistad.

articles.title: Portavoz de CDN advierte represalia nuclear a amenaza y chantaje nuclear de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Portavoz de CDN advierte represalia nuclear a amenaza y chantaje nuclear de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- En estos dias, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se llega a la fase catastrofica de estallido de la guerra nuclear.
					El dia 17, Estados Unidos realizo los ejercicios de lanzamiento de bombas nucleares en el cielo surcoreano movilizando la escuadrilla de bombardero estrategico B-52H de las 8a fuerzas aereas de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas en la isla Guam al espacio del Sur de Corea bajo el pretexto del entrenamiento de navegacion a larga distancia y de golpe contra los objetos estrategicos.
					
					Con anterioridad, el dia 13, envio en el Puerto de Pusan del Sur de Corea el submarino nuclear Mississippi, capaz de dar ataque nuclear.
					
					Tal entrenamiento de navegacion a larga distancia es una preparacion previa para llegar rapidamente al espacio aereo de la Peninsula Coreana y el ejercicio de golpe contra los objetos estrategicos y es el practico para dar ataque inesperado contra las instalaciones nucleares y otros lugares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Asi insistio el portavoz del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en la declaracion fechada 19 e insistio:
					
					En particular, la llegada al Sur de Corea del submarino nuclear que estaba en otras aguas es para revisar el caracter real de la movilizacion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares cuando se provocara la segunda guerra del 25 de junio.
					
					EE.UU. es una banda de bandidos que se valen de todos los medios inclusive la guerra nuclear para realizar con el garrote nuclear su malsana ambicion de doblegar nuestra voluntad y decision rotunda.
					
					He aqui la faz verdadera de la actual administracion norteamericana que habla tanto del "mundo sin armas nucleares" y la intencion verdadera del pais norteamericano que impone a la RPDC la "renuncia nuclear, primero".
					
					La realidad demuestra que la bandera de desarrollo paralelo levantada por el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC es el poste de senal mejor del mundo para defender la paz del pais y la seguridad de la nacion de la catastrofe de guerra nuclear.
					
					Apreciamos mucho la paz, pero, no queremos obtenerla con la mendicacion y simpatia.
					
					Nuestro modo de defensa de la paz es emprender el inmediato e implacable golpe preventivo de nuestro estilo contra quienes atentan la paz preciosa independientemente del lugar.
					
					Ya hace mucho tiempo, nuestro ejercito tomo como su blanco de golpe de precision todas las bases norteamericanas de agresion y abastecimientos militares contra la RPDC inclusive la base de las fuerzas aereas de Anderson de la isla Guam, donde despegue B-52H, y las bases maritimas de donde parte el submarino nuclear.
					
					EE.UU., enloquecida en la anacronica ilusion, no debe actuar con imprudencia.
					
					El mismo sabe bien la capacidad de represalia de la RPDC, convertida en la potencia nuclear del Oriente.
					
					La imprudencia ignorante de la realidad causara solo las  calamidades.
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo frustraran sin piedad la "sancion", el aplastamiento, la amenaza y chantaje nuclear de las fuerzas enemigas del interior y exterior del pais y marcharan con pasos firmes hacia la gran victoria.
					
					La victoria final esta al lado del gran partido, ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC.

articles.title: Imprudentes maniobras militares de Sur de Corea agudizan confrontacion y conflicto
articles.content:
Imprudentes maniobras militares de Sur de Corea agudizan confrontacion y conflicto
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- En estos dias, bajo el pretexto de "controlar" las actividades pesqueras ilegales de los barcos de tercero pais, los belicistas militares del Sur de Corea lanzan en gran cantidad los buques de combate con la odiosa bandera de las "fuerzas de la ONU" y la otra que simboliza el Sur de Corea hasta en la boca de rio Han pasando las aguas candentes del Mar Oeste hablando de la "operacion del rio Han".
					La boca del rio Han es un lugar donde hasta la fecha despues de logrado el armisticio en 1953 no entraron ni una vez las fuerzas militares de ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Tambien, es una zona en que sin ayuda de los aparatos de vigilancia, pueden ver correctamente todas las acciones de ambas partes.
					
					Precisamente en esta zona, el Sur de Corea desarrolla una "operacion" movilizando hasta los buques de combate y los helicopteros con los armamentos pesados, lo cual parte de la intencion malsana de preparar una oportunidad de la provocacion militar al extender al interior la invasion maritima en las aguas candentes del Mar Oeste de Corea.
					
					La presente operacion militar se comete a base de los minuciosos preparativos.
					
					Antes del inicio de esta operacion, los belicistas surcoreanos subieron de la etapa "3-A" a la "1" el estado de vigilancia de informaciones "Watchcon" y entraron de dia y noche en la vigilancia intensiva sobre la region de la RPDC movilizando aviones de reconocimiento sin piloto y otros medios de vigilancia electronica. Y una hora antes del inicio de la operacion, hicieron entrar en el estado de combate las unidades de artilleria de todas las zonas operacionales subiendo del tipo "C" al "A" su estado de preparacion de fuegos.
					
					A mediados de mayo, los titeres surcoreanos organizaron un grupo de cumplimiento de operacion con la infanteria maritima y las fuerzas armadas para el combate especial maritimo. Y desde el 10 de junio movilizaron a la flotilla movil de gran envergadura compuesta con los buques de combate y helicopteros y comenzaron a invadir con frecuencia la linea de limite maritimo de nuestra parte en todas las aguas candentes del mar sudoeste inclusive el islote Yonphyong.
					
					Todo esto demuestra claramente que los belicistas surcoreanos depositan una gran esperanza en la "operacion del rio Han" para realizar su ambicion de confrontacion con los compatriotas.
					
					Cinicamente, los provocadores hablan abiertamente de que en la boca del rio Han, en que no hay la linea de demarcacion militar ya establecida y estan muy restringidas las comunicaciones entre los buques, existen muchas posibilidades de eventuales conflictos armados en comparacion con las islas del noroeste.
					
					Estas locuras demuestran que los belicistas surcoreanas perpetran la "operacion del rio Han" teniendo como premisa un conflicto militar con nuestro ejercito.
					
					Ninguno de los anteriores gobernadores surcoreanos quienes ganaron mal infame en la confrontacion fratricida habia creado el peligro de conflicto en la boca del rio Han.
					
					Las locuras conflictivas de la banda de Park Geun-hye pasan el limite.
					
					Estas escalonadas maniobras militares de los belicistas surcoreanos que se perpetran desde la zona candente del mar Oeste hasta la boca del rio Han parten de la astuta intriga para conducir en estas aguas el enfrentamiento autodefensivo del ejercito coreano y divulgar ampliamente las opiniones publicas erroneas calificandolo de una "provocacion" y la "amenaza" de la RPDC.
					
					Lo que no podemos pasar por alto es que las tropas agresoras norteamericanas protegen y promueve estas locuras militares y toman parte directamente en ellas.
					
					Antes del inicio de la actual "operacion del rio Han", los agresores yanquis aparecieron en Phanmunjom y nos leyeron por altavoz un "aviso" para explicar una necesidad absoluta.
					
					Los yanquis actuan con la mascara de la Comision de Armisticio Militar, no reconocida por nadie, en el terreno de la operacion organizada por los titeres surcoreanos, de manera que mostraron voluntariamente que ellos son precisamente los autores principales de exacerbacion de la tension militar.
					
					EE.UU. es promotor que hace ahora mas de 60 anos fabrico de modo intencional las aguas mas candentes del mundo al inventar la ilegal, bandidesca y fantasmal "linea de limite al Norte" negando obstinadamente el establecimiento de la imparcial linea de demarcacion militar maritima en el Mar Oeste de Corea.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos son los maniacos conflictivos sin igual del mundo quienes intentan provocar la segunda guerra coreana bajo la instigacion de su amo norteamericano.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC aprecian mas que nadie la paz del pais y la seguridad de la nacion.
					
					Por tanto, no pueden tolerar ninguna provocacion militar inclusive la imprudente invasion maritima y el fuego anticipado.
					
					El ejercito coreano ya advirtio reiteradamente como castigaran a todos los provocadores que invaden nuestros sagrados territorio, mar y espacio aereo bajo nuestra soberania.
					
					Nuestro ejercito observa con alta vigilancia las cada dia mas peligrosas maniobras militares de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas y los belicistas surcoreanos.
					
					Los provocadores deben recordar las lecciones severas dadas en el canonazo contra el islote Yonphyong.
